body:
Versions up to 1.63.0 lack the `-c` option for C/C++ compiler commands in clang-linux.jam.
I fixed it.
※ The directory structure is different between the versions before 1.55.0 and the versions after 1.56.0.

Referenced:
http://boost.2283326.n4.nabble.com/Boost-Math-Weird-compiler-error-with-Clang-3-8-td4691122.html
title: boost: add -c option to C/C++ compile commands for clang.
